title: What Really Happened at the Vuelta a España? New Details Emerge of Inside-the-Bus Tension
content:
Jumbo-Visma finally backed Sepp Kuss for the win, but Primož Roglič wanted to keep racing: 'Only Primož had difficulty with it.'

Read the full article at What Really Happened at the Vuelta a España? New Details Emerge of Inside-the-Bus Tension on Velo.
author: ahood
